content.title: First blog(?) post!
content.textPre:
Hello! Welcome to my first blog post!
I don't actually think this page will become a blog, rather just place where I periodically place a cool picture I took and my insights on it. Or just not used at all since I am not really a blogger or anything like that. It might just become my testing site for new featues with the glass cards as well... Anyways thanks for reading!

content.title: Testing Image Feature #1
content.textPre:
Hey!
This is a new feature where I can place an image with a new blog entry and it will place it self dynamically?

content.title: Testing Image Feature #3
content.textPre:
Hey!
This is a new feature where I can place an image with a new blog entry and it will place it self dynamically? (v3)

 More tests to come soon!

content.title: Update on website
content.textPre:
Hello!

This is just a quick update on the website. Looks like I have finished most of what I want to accomplish for the blog page and will start working on trying to finish the content for the other pages as well. I might hook the data that is been shown here into a database if I am going to be writing here often but I am still not sure yet about that, so we will see.
There is still some issues/features that I might need to implement such as having images not always on the side of the card, and such. Anyways, I will update you guys here later!

-E.C
